short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. The items include Solenoid Valves, Power Full Repair Kit, Mechanical Linear Actuator, and Spare parts, all for the C-130 CC-130 Hercules with a start date of Not Available and an expected end date of Not Available. Requests for substitution of equivalent or fewer numbers of equivalents of materials will not be accepted. Requests for substitution of comparables are also acceptable. Any bid in foreign currency with be rejected as per regulations.
description: The tender is for the Department of National Defence. Requested delivery locations are at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. The C-130 CC-130 Hercules aircrafts are estimated to be maintained until the year 2045. Requests for substitution of equivalent or fewer numbers of equivalents of materials will not be accepted. Once a valid bid is submitted, the content of the bid will undergo a valid match between the buyer and supplier with a schedule detailing the how the content of the bid will be produced for the supplier, this notice is for the acquisition of the listed parts (item 1-12 below), including a list of inventory and spare parts. Please refer to the attachment (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/09/be2a320a682485af0ceca1d9dc1bed89/) for supplemental documents and information. There is a list of required goods and services, with detailed information, however I believe the providers should be encourage to ask if they do not understand, or require compatible goods and services different than those shown in the report (the C-130 CC-130 Hercules report), as information around aero parts can sometimes be hard to find. A C-130 CC-130 Hercules maintenance report was issued showing various marks and factual analysis of the parts variables and risks. A phone number to the point of contact telephone. The evidence of ITAR certification is attached (the report), while the proper certification or protecting arcresecond certificate plans is not included, however in conjunction with something it may sometimes however be included in a large financial document the it not associates lined.
full_summary:
=====================

### Solicitation for Request for Proposal: Solenoid Valves (W8482-230977/A)

#### Tender Title (English/French):

* *_English_: SOLENOID VALVES (W8482-230977/A)*
* *_French_: Électrovannes (W8482-230977/A)*

#### Identification and Address:

* *_Solicitation Number*: W8482-230977/A*
* *_Publication Date*: November 9, 2022*
* *_Tender Closing Date*: December 20, 2022, at 2:00:00*

#### Contracting Entity:

* *_Contracting Entity Name_: Department of National Defence*
* *_Contracting Entity Address_*:
			+ *_Address_: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A0K2*
			+ *_Phone_: (This information was not provided)
			+ *_Fax_: (This information was not provided)

#### Tender Description:

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the delivery of the following items:
- GSIN: N4810 - _Valves, Powered_: 
	+ NCAGE: 56607, LEXAIR INC. - INS-1 (Quantity: 80, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia)
	+ NCAGE: 56607, LEXAIR INC. - INS-2 (Quantity: 60, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia)
- GSIN: N4810 - _Valves, Powered_:
	+ NCAGE: 56607, LEXAIR INC - INS-3 (Quantity: 75, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia)
	+ NCAGE: 56607, LEXAIR INC - INS-4 (Quantity: 50, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia)

*Other items include:*

* No trade agreements were listed initially. 
*   Other information such as tender attachments and resources were not included.

### Tender Method and Evaluation:

* *_Tender Method_*: Competitive bids shall be submitted solely in response to this solicitation.
* *_Evaluation Method_*: The response proposals will be evaluated based on the authority listed above, although the exact process remains unclear, as no information was provided
